about_the_game:
Enhance the travel speed of special units and achieve even faster science studies with the add-on "Swift Rise"! Duration time - 6 months (180 days).

This package includes:
  • Explorer missions duration -50%
  • Merchant missions duration -50%
  • Alchemist science studies in all estates +25%
detailed_description:
